'''Simple Single-Person Tent''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Simple Single-Person Tent is purchasable from [[Goth]] for {{Item|Mora|24|x=50,000}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Birch Wood = 8
|Fabric = 4
|sort = Birch Wood;Fabric
}}
